Unless otherwise explicitly authorized in writing and in advance by
Tripadvisor, Customer will not: (a) use or disclose Order details, or any data
collected pursuant to this Agreement, for retargeting or any purpose other
than the display of the Licensed Content; or (b) use or disclose any Personal
Data collected from individual users during the display of any Licensed
Content.

For the avoidance of doubt, unless otherwise specified in this
Agreement, both parties agree that no collection, use, transfer, or processing
of Personal Data will occur as it pertains to Tripadvisor’s delivery of the
Services to the Customer.
